collection_holder_name: Arts Library, Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext.collection_title: David Freedman Collection of Scripts for RadioPrograms
pageContext.collection_description: Includes scripts for the Chase and Sanborn Coffee Hour, Elmer Everett Yess, The Big Show, The Red Skelton Show, Joe Cook's Patent Office, The Fire Chief, Ziegfeld Follies of the Air and other programs. Also includes Eddie Cantor sketches and some material related to other programs and treatments for screenplays. See online finding aid for complete list of programs with dates. See also a separate Freedman collection, also with scripts, in the Department of Special Collections, Charles E. Young Research Library.
